title: ZIMO.SYSTEM/RESUME_FILE
text:

      Skills: R, Excel, Python (Data Analysis); Power BI (Visualization)

      Major: Economics & Statistics (Undergraduate)
      Core Courses: Economics, Econometrics, Statistics, Calculus, Financial Math
      Research: Thesis on China’s Real Estate Bubble; Group project on COVID-19 Impact
      Skills: Stata, R, Python, LaTeX

    2023.05 – 2023.07 · Wuhan, China
    
      Position: Quantitative Research Intern
      Skills: Factor model analysis, report writing, time management
      Contribution: Participated in return model R&D and improved team efficiency
    
  

  
    📊 Marketing Analyst · Negotiation Competition
    2021.09 · Edinburgh, UK
    
      Teamwork: Collaborated with a 4-person team
      Analysis: Competitor pricing and data filtering
      Execution: Schedule planning and data presentation

title: ZIMO.SYSTEM/SHOW_TIME
